eu.monnetproject.lemon.model

Interface Frame

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LemonElement, LemonElementOrPredicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrameImpl

    public interface Frame
extends LemonElement
    A syntactic frame describing a syntactic behavior of an entry
    Author:
    John McCrae
